summary: Just a re-color for theycallmecheese\'s great dragonbone weapons.
descriptionHtml:
I just want to make an alternative version for theycallmecheese\'s great dragonbone weapon models. Just changed colors to match with another great retexture for Dragonplate armor, because I used both of them and looks great, (see pictures)

[b]feuerkorn\'s Dragonplate Retex: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3557[/b]

[b][color=red]All credits goes to theycallmecheese for his original work: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8863[/color][/b]

[b]TO INSTALL:[/b]
Just copy all files in .rar to your Data directory (you must delete or copy somewhere else theycallmecheese\'s .bsa file, because they doesn\'t work together.
author: theycallmecheese and TuCoT
